name: node-socket-webrtc-examples
description: 1. Run `yarn start` in `/react` folder to start a React application; 2. Run `yarn start` in `/server` folder to start a Node.js server;

scripts.start:dev:withStandalonePeerServer: concurrently "cd server && yarn start" "cd react && yarn start" "cd peerjs-server && yarn start"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd packages/server && yarn start" "cd packages/react && yarn start"
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules && yarn clean:common && yarn clean:peer && yarn clean:server
